name: windfall

windfall noun [C]
(MONEY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
an amount of money that you win or receive from someone unexpectedly: Investors each received a windfall of £3,000.UK The government is hoping to collect a windfall tax (= extra tax on a large unexpected company profit) from British Electric.

(FRUIT)
